participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys exploring different worlds through writing.
participant_1.background: I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background. last season i was just getting started. my favorite food is mashed potatoes. i am the youngest of five. i write fiction for fun.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and practical, loves to keep active and engage in hands-on activities.
participant_2.background: I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade. i own a small farm where i herd cattle. i have male pattern baldness. i like to stay fit. I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food.

content.text: My favorite food is mashed potatoes!
Mashed potatoes are great! What is your favorite way to eat them?
I love them with gravy, butter, and cheese! What about you?
I like them with gravy too, but I'm not a big fan of cheese.
I'm a big fan of cheese in general. I love to make my own cheese.
Oh wow! That's awesome! What kind of cheese do you make?
I make a lot of different kinds of cheese, but my favorite is probably mozzarella.
Mozzarella is delicious! I love it on pizza.
Me too! I also love it in salads and sandwiches.
Me too! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to stay fit by hiking and biking. I also like to write fiction for fun.
That's cool! I like to hike too. What kind of fiction do you write?
I write fantasy and science fiction.
That's awesome! I love to read both of those genres.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! It's been nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day!
